page.title: 03 A typical week in Gringley
page.content:
{Sat.8.June}Annual swimming gala 6:30pm at Retford Sports Centre.Monthly extra refuse collection 10:00am.Garden fete 3:00pm.
{Sun.9.June}Church 9:30am.Sunday school 10:00am.Methodist service 10:30am.
{Mon.10.June }St.Peter's School 9:00am -3:30pm.Monthly Ladies Group Meeting. "The Beacon" Parish Magazine:monthly Editorial discussion 7:30pm.Aerobics class 7:30pm(Dance exercises to music -attracts mainly women).
{Tues.11.June}St.Peter's School.Weekly Toddlers Group 1:15-3:20pm (in St. Peter's School Hall).Men's Group Circuit Training in Detention Centre gymnasium.(Circuit of different physical exercises). {P.T.O.
